mapper.select: SELECT billing_period, SUM(CASE WHEN previous_payment > 0 AND previous_payment < previous_total THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS underpaid, SUM(CASE WHEN previous_payment >= previous_total THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS paid, SUM(CASE WHEN previous_payment = 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS unpaid, COUNT(billing_details.id) AS total FROM billing_details where billing_period = #{periodId} GROUP BY billing_period;

SELECT billing_period, SUM(CASE WHEN previous_payment > 0 AND previous_payment < previous_total THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS underpaid, SUM(CASE WHEN previous_payment >= previous_total THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS paid, SUM(CASE WHEN previous_payment = 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS unpaid, COUNT(billing_details.id) AS total FROM billing_details where billing_period <= #{periodId} GROUP BY billing_period limit 5;

SELECT billing_period.PERIOD_DATE as periodDate, SUM(amount) as amount FROM payment INNER JOIN billing_period ON billing_period.id = payment.billing_period WHERE billing_period <= #{periodId} GROUP BY payment.billing_period limit 5;
